= Introduction =

User Manual for Kannada TTS

= Details =

  * Once the build is complete execute the program

  * TTS dialog box appears on the screen.

  * The GUI has 

      #1 Kannada Edit Box - Kannada Edit Box is a where the user can type in kannada text with Nudi software running in transliteration mode. 
      #2 Speak Button - At the click of the Speak Button, Vaachaka converts text into intelligible speech.
      #3 Repeat Button - The user can hear the synthesized speech repeatedly by clicking the Repeat Button.
      #4 Exit Button - The user can exit Vaachaka by clicking on the Exit Button
